messages.msgSnippet: I just found a book called The Uesugi Samurai Heroes 2 written by Martin Jones and Terje Solum published by Dai Sho Publishing (London) 1995. Its a short
messages.messageBody:
I just found a book called 'The Uesugi' Samurai Heroes 2 written by Martin Jones and Terje Solum published by Dai Sho Publishing (London) 1995. Its a short work on Uesugi Kenshin. The writer also penned a book on Takeda Shingen (Samurai Heroes 1?) and was going to write one on II Naomasa. Does anyone have any info on these books and the writer, especially where I can find these books. Thanks


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.msgSnippet: Take a look at: http://brookhursthobbies.com/twodrag.htm The books are listed at the foot of the page, but I can t see any links to order. I d be interested in
messages.messageBody:
Take a look at:

http://brookhursthobbies.com/twodrag.htm

The books are listed at the foot of the page, but I can't see any links to order.

I'd be interested in your opinion of the one you have.

Thomas
